name: School Time!
description:
Made for smwhr for the Secret Santa Jam 2021

"School Time!" is a short text adventure, made in the style of comedy as old point-and-click games, where you attempt to go about your morning and get your kids to school, so you can go back to making games for your itch.io, but a strange person, and a strange light, come to ruin your fun... as if this were all part of some bigger scheme.

Part 1 of potentially a few.

Featuring:

  • High-octane, text-reading gameplay
  • At least 1 line of text to read from (try and read them all!)
  • The ability to burn your PC by going through your game dev portfolio
  • In-depth toast-making mechanics
  • 3 different endings (that means there's atleast 4 lines of text!)
